summary: After the death of his father Murat II, Mehmet II ascends to the Ottoman throne. After braving internal and external enemies, he decides to complete what he was destined to do - conquer Constantinople.
cast: Devrim Evin|Ibrahim Celikkol|Dilek Serbest|Cengiz Coskun|Erden Alkan|Recep Aktug|Raif Hikmet Cam|Naci Adigüzel|Sedat Mert|Mustafa Atilla Kunt|Ozcan Aliser|Yilman Babaturk|Murat Sezal|Faik Aksoy|Huseyin Santur|Namik Kemal Yigittürk|Oner As|Halis Bayraktaroglu|Izzet Çivril|Ali Riza Soydan|Sahika Koldemir|Songül Kaya|Adnan Kürkçü|Lili Rich|Celal Al|Bumin Dedecan|Ozan Gençel|Özkan Güngör|Volkan Keskin|Faruk Metin|Toprak Ömer Seran|Nazim Solmaz|Mertcan Tekin|Edip Tüfekci|Yigit Yarar|Goktug Yasar|Fatih Zenginoglu|Ozan Çobanoglu|Murat Ünaloglu|Özcan Özdemir
title: Conquista 1453
